post_summaries.description: The image shows a plate of vegan food. The plate contains roasted potatoes, green beans, vegan meatballs, and a salad with shredded carrots, cabbage, and what appears to be fried tofu or croutons. The plate has a black and white floral pattern.
The image shows a plate of risotto with spring onions, garlic, mushrooms, zucchini, and plant-based smoked salmon.
The image shows a bowl of red lentil soup and pita bread topped with hummus, tomato, and cucumber.
The image shows a plate of vegan food, including berry rice, edamame, tempeh, roasted peanuts, nuts, and seeds.
The image shows a plate of vegan food, including what appears to be a vegan "kip" (chicken) burger, potato wedges, green beans, and a salad with various vegetables.
The image shows a close-up of a vegan dish, described as Witlof (endive) from the oven with onion, vegan minced meat, a mixed sauce, and plant-based cheese.

conversation_topics: 1. Vegan cooking: Ask about their favorite vegan recipes or cooking tips.

profile_bio.LIFESTYLE: Likely someone who enjoys cooking and experimenting with vegan recipes. They are passionate about plant-based eating and creating diverse and appealing vegan meals. They likely spend time sourcing ingredients and preparing food at home.
CONVERSATION STARTERS: What are some of your favorite vegan recipes to cook?
Have you tried many different plant-based 'smoked salmon' alternatives? Which one do you recommend?
Could you share the recipe for your berry rice and tempeh dish?
What inspired you to adopt a vegan lifestyle?
What are some of your go-to vegan comfort food recipes?
